Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, short and wide, too wide. Cracked away to the point boundary. Whistled to the fence
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, nice length that. Back of a length on off, defended
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full outside off, bowled from wider of the crease. Pushed to mid-off
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, back of a length on off, Hafeez walks across to try and flick him away. Off the thigh pad through
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, good length on off. Impeccable lines. Defended into the cover region

Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, OUT, gone. Hafeez has to go. Short outside off, angled away. Hafeez tries to pull but gets it off the upper half of the bat. Skied away into the hands of midwicket. Big wicket, with D/L and rain lingering about
Wicket: ['Mohammad Hafeez c Wessels b Mohammad Amir 4 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 66.66']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Allenby, no run, overpitched on off, pushed to mid-off
Sohail Khan to Allenby, no run, back of a length on off, pushed to cover. Good bowling this. Very tight lines
Sohail Khan to Allenby, no run, full and wide, that should have been put away. Squeezed towards point where Shakib makes a good stop
Sohail Khan to Allenby, 1 run, slower ball, worked to short fine leg for a run
Sohail Khan to Malan, 1 run, fullish outside off, driven towards wide mid-off for a single
Sohail Khan to Allenby, no run, great over this. Length on off, pushed to mid-off. Just two of the over.
Mohammad Amir to Malan, no run, full on off, pushed away to extra cover.
Mohammad Amir to Malan, no run, fullish length outside off, Malan tries to go down the ground but fails to connect. Dot balls piling up early
Mohammad Amir to Malan, no run, great bowling. Changes his length, short outside off. Malan surprised by the change-up, lets it go.
Mohammad Amir to Malan, 1 run, flicked to deep square leg off his pads for a run
Mohammad Amir to Allenby, 1 run, shortish and wide, flayed away down to third man.
Mohammad Amir to Malan, no run, full on middle, swatted away to mid-on. Another excellent over from Amir. Pressure building.
Sohail Khan to Allenby, 1 run, overpitched on off, drilled to mid-off
Sohail Khan to Malan, 1 run, slower ball on middle, swiped to deep square leg. Just the one
Sohail Khan to Allenby, 1 run, short delivery down leg, Allenby fails to connect properly with his pull.
Sohail Khan to Malan, no run, full on middle, Malan inside-edges his heave to point. Allenby runs down but is sent back just in time
Sohail Khan to Malan, 1 run, bowling to their field. Length on middle and leg, heaved to deep midwicket
Sohail Khan to Allenby, 1 run, another slower delivery on middle, inside-edged to square leg. These two looking all at sea
Bilawal Bhatti to Allenby, FOUR, smashed for four. Short and wide, width and Allenby cuts it past point for four. Great shot
Bilawal Bhatti to Allenby, 3 runs, full outside off, pushed in the gap at cover for three. Well played. Opened up his stance and made some room.
Bilawal Bhatti to Malan, FOUR, that will be four more. Short on middle, Malan slogs it away to the midwicket fence. All important runs to get close to the target
Bilawal Bhatti to Malan, OUT, gone, that could be the game. Short delivery on middle, Malan looks to slog it away and gets a thick outside edge which goes up and is taken by the keeper.
Bilawal Bhatti to Allenby, 1 run, clipped to midwicket for a run.
Wicket: ['DJ Malan c †Saifullah Bangash b Bilawal Bhatti 8 (11b 1x4 0x6) SR: 72.72']

Commentary: Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, no run, we have a game. Full on off, driven to mid-off
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, flicked to square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, 1 run, shortish again on middle, worked away to deep midwicket
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, no run, turned to square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, FOUR, smashed for four. Gets down early and pummels the sweep to the square leg boundary. Great execution.
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, no run, nudged to square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, no run, slow again on middle and leg, square leg is found again.l
Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, 1 run, good length outside off, steered down to third man
Bilawal Bhatti to Allenby, no run, slower delivery on off, Allenby is early through the stroke and misses his pull
Bilawal Bhatti to Allenby, 1 run, length on off, patted away to deep point
Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, 1 run, fullish outside off, pushed past cover for a run
Bilawal Bhatti to Allenby, FOUR, in the air and into the boundary. Slower ball on middle and leg, Allenby hoicks it away to the backward square leg boundary
Bilawal Bhatti to Allenby, 1 run, shortish and wide, chopped towards point who misfields.
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, 1 run, tossed up on off, drilled to long-off
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, 1 run, shortish on off, chopped to deep point for one
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, 1 run, driven to long-off with the spin
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, no run, flight on middle, hits Hodge on the pad. Sliding down
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, no run, shortish on off, punched to cover
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, 1 run, lovely over. Quick over. Lots of flight on off, pushed to point for a quick run.
Usama Mir to Hodge, no run, flat again on leg, skids off the pitch and hits Hodge on the pad
Usama Mir to Hodge, FOUR, short and wide, lots of room. Hodge flays a cut into the gap at point for four. Splendid shot
Usama Mir to Hodge, 1 run, flat outside off, drilled to the sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Allenby, no run, clipped towards midwicket. Looked like a long run. No run taken. The bowler does well
Usama Mir to Allenby, no run, flat outside off, cut away to point
Usama Mir to Allenby, FOUR, clever stroke. Exceptional batting. Allenby gets down and just paddles a sweep to the fine leg boundary. Two boundaries of the over
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, 1 run, shortish on off, smashed to the sweeper cover
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, 1 run, short and wide, cracked to the sweeper again
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, no run, hit to cover
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, no run, pushed to point. Hodge wants one, Allenby doesn't. Dot
Shakib Al Hasan to Hodge, 1 run, full outside off, drilled to the sweeper cover for a run
Shakib Al Hasan to Allenby, no run, splendid over. Full on off, hit back to the bowler who does well in his follow-through.
Usama Mir to Hodge, 1 run, flat on off, pushed to point
Usama Mir to Allenby, OUT, given. Allenby has to go. Flat delivery on middle and leg, Allenby tries to sweep but fails to connect. The ball sneaks through and hits him on the thigh. Looked out
Usama Mir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, pushed to long-on for a run.
Usama Mir to Hodge, 1 run, flat on off, the bat face is opened to the sweeper cover
Wicket: ['J Allenby lbw b Usama Mir 31 (29b 4x4 0x6) SR: 106.89']

Commentary: Usama Mir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, flat on middle, off the inside edge towards midwicket
Usama Mir to Hodge, no run, flat on off, pushed back to the bowler. Good over from Usama
Bilawal Bhatti to Shahid Afridi, 2 runs, short on middle, helped on its way to backward square leg, two more
Bilawal Bhatti to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, yorker. Worked to deep midwicket

Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, FOUR, four. thick edge. Important runs. Short and wide outside off, Hodge tries to flay it through point but gets there late and gets a thick outside edge which flies to the third man fence
Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, 1 run, shortish on middle, swatted to square leg

Bilawal Bhatti to Shahid Afridi, OUT, Afridi is not happy. He has been given. But what is happening out there? Fullish delivery on off, Afridi gets hit on the thigh and the umpire raises the finger. He rams into Bhatti as he looks to complete the run and knocks him over, like a bowling pin. Immediate apology from Afridi. Maybe the frustration of the decision.
Bilawal Bhatti to Kamran Akmal, 1 leg bye, hustling Kamran for pace now. Length on middle, off the thigh pad towards third man for a leg bye. Kamran gets to the ball very late
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, no run, short on off, cut to point
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, no run, flight on off, pushed to cover
Wicket: ['Shahid Afridi lbw b Bilawal Bhatti 5 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, scythed away to the sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Hodge, FOUR, four. Not great fielding. Short on middle, Hodge wallops the pull into the gap at square leg. The fielder runs around and jumps over it. A few extra runs
Usama Mir to Hodge, FOUR, superb shot. Lots of flight on off, Hodge sees the opportunity and drills it down the ground, to the long-on boundary
Usama Mir to Hodge, 1 run, steered to third man
Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, no run, superb yorker outside off. Hodge cannot get bat on it. Dot.

Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, FOUR, what a great effort from Wessels. Short delivery to Hodge, wrong decision. Hodge picks it early and thwacks it away in the air to midwicket. Wessels runs around and somehow gets hand on it, not enough to prevent the boundary through
Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, 1 run, yorker, jammed to long-on
Bilawal Bhatti to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, yorker length on off, guided to point.
Bilawal Bhatti to Hodge, 1 run, drilled to long-on. Good length, overly full. Preventing Hodge from getting under it
Bilawal Bhatti to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, another terrific yorker on middle, pushed back towards long-on
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 1 leg bye, full down leg, off the pad, Looked destined for the boundary until the keeper intervened with a dive
Mohammad Amir to Hodge, 1 run, fullish length on middle, inside-edged to square leg for a run
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, shot from Akmal. Slower ball on off, drilled down to the mid-off fence, Kept curling away from the umpire towards mid-off. Sliced hit.
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, low full toss, around the wicket. On middle, pushed to long-on. One run
Mohammad Amir to Hodge, 2 runs, straight back past the bowler for two. Pretty good shot. Earns him a couple. Long-off cleans up
Mohammad Amir to Hodge, 1 run, gives himself room by clearing one foot. Bunted down to long-off, just the one. But not a bad over for Zalmi.
Usama Mir to Hodge, FOUR, unlucky for Mir but those are four vital runs. Short and flat outside off, a thick inside edge to the fine leg boundary
Usama Mir to Hodge, no run, short and flat outside off, Hodge misses.
Usama Mir to Hodge, SIX, big hit. Six. Match-changing over this seems. Too full, allowing Hodge to get under it and lofting it easily over long-off for six.
Usama Mir to Hodge, SIX, that is massive. Flat down leg, easy pickings for Hodge. He just clobbers it over the square leg boundary. Fifty for Hodge, superb batting
Usama Mir to Hodge, SIX, another six. Flat outside off, Hodge lifts it over cover this time for six. Played that with the turn.

Usama Mir to Hodge, 1 run, OUT, ooh, that is close. Drilled towards long-off, Bopara does exceptionally well. Picks up cleanly and fires a throw straight over the bails. The bowler whips the bails off to find Akmal short. Superb fielding. Does that change the game again?
Mohammad Amir to Sammy, 1 leg bye, good length on middle, Sammy is beaten but gets hit on the thigh pad. A leg bye
Mohammad Amir to Hodge, SIX, another six. High full toss outside off, Hodge lifts it over the sweeper cover boundary this time. Wow, what a shot.
Mohammad Amir to Hodge, 2 runs, yorker on middle and leg, jammed out to midwicket for a brace.
Mohammad Amir to Hodge, no run, yorker down leg, great delivery. Hodge cannot connect. Dot ball. Karachi need a wicket badly
Mohammad Amir to Hodge, 1 run, low full toss on middle, inside-halved to square leg for one

Mohammad Amir to Sammy, FOUR, very unlucky but that's the way the game goes. Yorker outside off, Sammy brings his bat down late to jam it down. Off the outside edge to the third man fence. Third man was up.
Bopara to Hodge, SIX, slower ball which sat up for Hodge. Smashed away over the square leg boundary. Picked the length so early and smashed it.
Bopara to Hodge, 1 run, shortish and wide, Hodge cuts towards short third man for one
Bopara to Sammy, 1 run, jammed out to point
Bopara to Hodge, SIX, six more. That has to be the game. Short outside off, Hodge punishes it. Smashes it high and wide over midwicket. Wow, easily clears the man
Bopara to Hodge, 1 run, drilled to long-off for a run
Bopara to Sammy, no run, slower ball on middle, defended back
Sohail Khan to Hodge, 1 run, full outside off, drilled to mid-off with extraordinary power. Bopara does well.
Sohail Khan to Sammy, no run, bouncer on middle, Sammy gets underneath it
Sohail Khan to Sammy, SIX, Over. It's all over. Short delivery on off, Sammy whacks it over midwicket for a massive six to end this game.
